InstructionData.Title: CO2INJ - CO2 Injector
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
define CO2PP 0.5
alias Sensor d0 alias Pump d1
alias pressure r0 alias pp r1 alias ratio r2 alias inject r3
loop: l pressure Sensor Pressure l ratio Sensor RatioCarbonDioxide mul pp ratio pressure s db Setting pp slt inject pp CO2PP s Pump On inject s Pump Setting 1 yield j loop
